description: From winter wandering to fall hiking, the versatile Capa Vest is here for it all. Made with Primaloft® Gold P.U.R.E. 100% recycled synthetic insulation, this vest retains warmth even when wet. To keep you really comfortable in weather, it also features a windproof and waterresistant recycled nylon shell. Packable, breathable, warm, the Capa is great for layering when the temps drop.
name: Cotopaxi Capa Insulated Vest - Mens
